definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Are pesticides stored away from products, product containers, and other chemicals?
sentences.chinese: 杀虫剂是否与产品，包装物和其它化学品分开？

sentences.english: But if they are packaged as a long strip of tea, then have a larger degree of difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 而如被包装物为较长的条形茶叶的话，难度就比较大。

sentences.english: The new type of suitcase card designed by our engineers is very ingenious and practical.
sentences.chinese: 我们的工程师设计的包装物卡片精致而实用。

sentences.english: Export to the consultation of the national latest packing article market access standard in the destination.
sentences.chinese: 出口目的地国家最新包装物市场准入标准的咨询。

sentences.english: Improving the cradle-to-grave environmental performance of packaging.
sentences.chinese: 改善包装物从生产到废弃个过程，以符合环保功能。

sentences.english: The use of microwave ovens designed for the provision of containers and packaging.
sentences.chinese: 了对容器和包装物的设计提供微波炉的使用。

sentences.english: Many countries to promote the re-use of packaging and regeneration treatment.
sentences.chinese: 很多国家提倡包装物的重复使用和再生处理。

sentences.english: The contractible film can prevent moving and can keep the moisture content of packed goods.
sentences.chinese: 收缩性薄膜可防止换动并能保持所包装物的湿气成分。

sentences.english: Customized, according to the characteristics of the packaging is designed.
sentences.chinese: 量身订做，可以根据包装物的特性专门设计。

sentences.english: Ship your packages using your own packaging material along with this Priority Mail decal.
sentences.chinese: 邮寄包裹时用你自己的包装物并加贴此优先邮标签。

definition: to recycle/to reclaim/to retrieve/to recover/to recall (a defective product)
remnants of material from an industrial process/offcut/scraps
agricultural plastic, used largely for creating greenhouses
carton (e.g. for milk or juice)/Tetra Pak
